author: Wayne Parker
text: Has anyone looked at the concept of accepting Bitcoin for transactions such as utility payments, business license fees, etc?  We have been approached by a group of citizens wanting us to consider accepting Bitcoin in our financial transactions.  I'd appreciate knowing if anyone has looked at it, done it or rejected the idea entirely.
title: Bitcoin for Local Government Transactions
